sentences.en: A twelve hour night time curfew is in force.
Anyone found in the streets after curfew was shot.
sentences.cn: 宵禁期间，任何人出现在街上都被开枪打死。

sentences.en: Austin: What? Do you have a curfew or something?
sentences.cn: 奥斯汀: 怎 麽,你是不是还有宵禁令或类似的东西?

sentences.en: Authorities also sent armored vehicles to the area and imposed a curfew.
sentences.cn: 当局向骚乱地区派遣了装甲车,并在当地实施宵禁.

sentences.en: In Lucknow crowds of people defied the curfew to celebrate on the streets.
sentences.cn: 在勒克瑙，成群的人们违抗宵禁令到街上去庆祝。

sentences.en: Is there a woman named Park Hae - oak who got caught during the curfew?
sentences.cn: 你们宵禁时抓到过叫朴河鸥的 吗 ?

sentences.en: No one walked in the street, for the curfew was strict.
sentences.cn: 路上因为实行宵禁而行人绝迹.

sentences.en: The ANC claimed the curfew gave licence to the police to hunt people as if they were animals.
sentences.cn: 非国大声称宵禁使得警察肆无忌惮地把人们当动物来抓捕。

sentences.en: The army imposed a dusk-to-dawn curfew.
sentences.cn: 军队强制实行黄昏至黎明的宵禁。

sentences.en: The army is now on patrol in Srinagar and a curfew has been imposed.
sentences.cn: 军队目前在斯利那加巡逻，且已实行了宵禁。

sentences.en: The curfew was lifted (= ended ) on May 6th.
The government imposed a night-time curfew throughout the country.
The local administration says the curfew is a precautionary measure.
sentences.cn: 地方当局说宵禁是一种预防措施。

sentences.en: The village was placed under curfew.
The whole town was placed under curfew .
There were some moves to let up on this curfew a little bit.
sentences.cn: 采取了一些措施以缓和宵禁的紧张气氛。

sentences.en: Thousands of people have taken to the streets in defiance of the curfew.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的人不顾宵禁涌上街头。

sentences.en: To go out after curfew was to risk death.
sentences.cn: 宵禁后出门是去冒丧命的危险.

sentences.en: We'll keep the roadblocks and the curfew in effect through the night.
sentences.cn: 今天整个晚上,我们都要设置路障,并执行宵禁令.

trans.tran_en: a law that forces people to stay indoors after a particular time at night, or the time people must be indoors
